name: Lene
insights: Lene is the only hero with Safeguard+.
Lene is the only hero with Safeguard.
Lene is the only hero with Firestorm Dance 2.
Lene is the only hero with Firestorm Dance 1.
Lene has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Sword heroes.
description: A dancer and descendant of the high priest Bragi. She understands how the world works, but she doesn't let it get her down. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

dialogue.text: I'm Lene! You'll get to know me faster if I dance instead of talk, so... Here goes!
When it's time to go shopping, I dance to earn money for ingredients... What do you want for dinner?
Through dancing, I transmit energy to the audience. Even though I'm in a new world now, that hasn't changed.
You're always up so early. Impressive! Hey, why don't I accompany you on your rounds?
As a dancer, I spend a lot of time on my appearance. Of course, it starts with clothes, but it doesn't end there... So... Wanna take me shopping?
Hey, <Player Name>... Something wrong? What is it? You keep looking my way... Ha! I was just teasing. You can take it easy.
Hi there. I'm Lene! I've come all the way here just to say hello. Hi, from <Friend Name>!
That was about usual. At least I'm not getting worse...
That's no good at all! I guess I was out too late last night.
My body feels so light... I have some ideas for new footwork— I'll show you later!

Hmm... What color should I wear today? Just a touch of makeup, and... Oh, <Player Name>! What's that? When you look at me, you forget about the war? That's the idea—I dance to raise people's spirits! And if I dance in rags, it will just remind them of the war, not make them forget about it. I am not a warrior... I am a dancer. I want to bring a touch of color to people's lives. If I can make the sadness and the terror of fighting disappear from their minds, even for a moment, then... I've done my job. If the war is getting you down, and you're feeling exhausted... Just come and see me. I'll dance just for you!

origin: Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War
